name: Godot Lidar Demo
description:
LIDAR scanner from the GMod LIDAR addon in Godot.

Use the Linux/Windows downloads if you are experiencing bad performance on the web version

Controls: 

MovementWASDScan
Left mouseChange scanner sizeMouse wheel up/downFull scanRight mouseReset dotsRToggle viewE

Source code is available here: https://github.com/Ryhon0/GodotLidar
